body:
You could add here: https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/blob/master/test/test_cuda.py#L282
```
('qr', large_2d_lapack, lambda t: [], 'large', float_types),
```

and here: https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/blob/master/test/test_cuda.py#L114 add:

```
def large_2d_lapack(t):
    return t(1000, 1000).normal_()

```
